pattern.name: main

rule.assert: info~Testing the <manifest> element for conformance
info~Testing multiplicity of the <manifest> element
passed~The imsmanifest.xml file contains 1 and only 1 <manifest> element
info~Testing multiplicity of the "identifier" attribute
failed~The <manifest> element shall contain 1 and only 1 "identifier" attribute
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 "identifier" attribute
info~Testing the "identifier" attribute for conformance
failed~The "identifier" attribute [] of the <manifest> element is not unique within the manifest
passed~The "identifier" of manifest is unique within the manifest
info~Testing multiplicity of the "version" attribute
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 "version" attribute
info~Testing the character length of the "version" attribute value
warning~The value contained in the "version" attribute is greater than the SPM of 20 characters
passed~The character length for the value of the "version" attribute has passed conformance
info~Testing multiplicity of the "xml:base" attribute
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 "xml:base" attribute
info~Testing the "xml:base" attribute for conformance
failed~The "xml:base" attribute shall not contain any backward slashes
failed~The "xml:base" attribute shall not begin with a leading slash
failed~The "xml:base" attribute shall end with a trailing slash
passed~The "xml:base" attribute is correctly formatted
info~Testing the character length of the "xml:base" attribute value
warning~The value contained in the "xml:base" attribute is greater than the SPM of 2000 characters
passed~The character length for the value of the "xml:base" attribute has passed conformance
info~Testing multiplicity of the <metadata> element
failed~The <manifest> element shall contain 1 and only 1 <metadata> element
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 and only 1 <metadata> element
info~Testing multiplicity of the <organizations> element
failed~The <manifest> element shall contain 1 and only 1 <organizations> element
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 and only 1 <organizations> element

failed~The <manifest> element shall contain 1 and only 1 <resources> element
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 and only 1 <resources> element
info~Testing multiplicity of the <sequencingCollection> element
failed~The <manifest> element shall contain 0 or 1 <sequencingCollection> element
passed~The <manifest> element contains 1 <sequencingCollection> element
info~Testing the location of the "adlcp:scormType" attribute
failed~The "adlcp:scormType" attribute must exist on a <resource> element

passed~The <metadata> element contains 1 and only 1 <schema> element
